attributes.action: The Right To Squeak And Free Cheese To Every Mouse!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has been too long now that the rights of mice all over Britain have been abused, allow us the right to squeak! We request our own government recognised mouse council that can meet and discuss issues that affect us and rules and laws for our colonies. Give us the right to vote through Squeak!

we are citizens of this country and receive no benefits in the harsh times of winter. Allow us the mousely right to a cheese benefit system to keep all mice in cheese- else we shall start nipping ankles!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
